name: Catch Me If You Can V2
name_original: Catch Me If You Can V2
description:
Catch Me If You Can is a simple 1 week remake of an old game I made also called Catch me If You Can, which is a top down arcade time waster game where the goal is to not get caught by the enemies. 

Force the enemies to collide into one another and gain point!  The longer you survive, the more chaotic it becomes. How long can you survive?

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

WASD -> Move

SPACE -> Use Ability
